article.title: Weston to Perform Work for Regional Data Acquisition Center in Hawaii
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Weston Solutions Incorporated, San Antonio, Texas, is being awarded a $10 million task order for installation of advanced metering infrastructure meters and supporting communication infrastructure for Navy Region Hawaii installations: Camp Smith; West Loch, Joint Base Pearl Harbor-Hickam; Lualualei; Naval Computer and Telecommunications Area Master Station; and associated work at Pacific Missile Range Facility. The objective is to have one regional data acquisition system located at Building 166, Pearl Harbor. The Naval Facilities Engineering Command, Hawaii, Pearl Harbor, Hawaii, is the contracting activity.
